title: Sports Water Bottles 3 Pcs Set With Leak Proof Flip Top Lid (Random Color)

Description
Sports Water Bottles 3 Pcs Set With Leak Proof Flip Top Lid (Random Color)

3 piece motivational sports water bottles. SAFE MATERIAL: Our gym water bottle is made of free and healthier. It is suitable for your daily drinking water, leak-proof and dust-proof. GRADIENT RAMP DESIGN: With a stylish gradient look, water bottle with measurements has a strong visual impact that makes you drink water and make you happy. PERFECT GIFTS: Our workout water bottle is the perfect gift for Christmas, birthday, Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, Labor Day, and for family, friends, colleagues or classmates. Kit with 3 bottles of water, goes a bottle inside the Reinforced design, one click to open. -Design with handle, easy to carry. -Anti-clearance -Material: PC. -Capacity: 2000ml,850ml,350ml -3 Bottles random colours
